channel.title: Robot on David Bieber
channel.description: Recent content in Robot on David Bieber

item.title: Bieber Bot
item.description: Bieber Bot is a highly motivated robot that assists me with my financials, tweets on my behalf, and keeps me productive when my brain feels otherwise. Is Bieber Bot related to Justin Bieber? No, no relation. Bieber Bot is my own creation. How does Bieber Bot work? I communicate with Bieber Bot primarily via Facebook messenger. Bieber Bot’s brain is a collection of Google Apps Scripts, and Bieber Bot’s memory is mostly spreadsheets in Google Sheets.
